titles.title: Come To The Sun Of Righteousness

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Come to the Sun of Righteousness, He has healing in His wings. (2x)
He has healing in His wings. (2x)
Come to the Sun of Righteousness,
He has healing in His wings.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Come to the Bread, the Bread of Life, And the hungry shall be filled. (2x)
And the hungry shall be filled. (2x)
Come to the Bread, the Bread of Life,
And the hungry shall be filled.
